about_the_game:
Enter Confinio: Reality Prison, a 2D graphic novel where darkness shrouds your past and uncertainty guides your steps. Wake up in a cell with no memory where your decisions will mark your destiny.

You've just woken up, you're confused,

You look around without knowing where you are. It looks like a cell, are you trapped? You don't remember anything that happened. How did you get there? What's going on? Too many unanswered questions. Are there more people here? Would you trust them? Would you let them help you? So many decisions to make.

You will have to gradually discover the reality, even if it is not what you expected. Make cautious decisions, as these will be the ones that will build your path in prison. Try to remember who you are and stay strong, for at any moment madness can take hold of you.

Become Dromaius, the protagonist with no memories. Wander through the prison in confusion, making choices that will create your reality, but be careful not to let that reality lead to your death.

Meet the other inmates, interact with them and discover their stories. Every interaction, every object, every decision will bring you closer to the truth.

Test your dexterity with mini-games that you must overcome to escape. But don't expect the answer to these to be the obvious one.

A psychological mystery that will keep you on edge until the very end.

  • A unique 2D graphic novel style: Graphics that immerse you in the dark and oppressive atmosphere of the prison.

  • Decisions that matter: Choose your path and discover how your actions affect the outcome of the story.

  • Memorable characters: A cast of eccentric inmates with their own stories and motivations.

  • Intriguing mini-games: Break the routine with short, plot-influencing games.

Are you ready to face reality and discover the truth behind Confinio: Reality Prison?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7/8/10 (32-bit or 64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with at least 512 MB VRAM and DirectX 11 support
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with at least 512 MB VRAM and DirectX 11 support
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Confinio is an intriguing visual novel that delves into your sensations as you embody the protagonist who has just awakened in a prison with no memory. Make decisions, solve puzzles, interact with the environment, use objects, interrogate people, all to yourself and uncover the enigmatic reality.
